description: Compression encoding generally used for full color and grayscale continuous-tone pictorial images.  Core coding uses a discrete wavelet transform and other compression elements in a variable manner, and the outcome may be lossy or lossless.
name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system (formal name); JPEG 2000 core coding (common name)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">j2c</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
